subtitle: Choose a lean type of sausage for this recipe and serve with fluffy mashed potatoes.

method.text: Prick sausage all over with a fork. Place in a large stock pot and cook over a medium heat for 3-5 min until browned on all sides. Remove from pot. Cut into thick slices.

Add the oil to the pot. Fry chicken thighs for 5-10 min, turning frequently until well browned. Remove the chicken from the pot and keep warm. Add the garlic and onions to the pot and cook for 2-3 min or until softened.

title: Southern country boil
